languages.text: {n}Идира резко втягивает воздух и закашливается. Из ее рта на пол летит что-то белесое и шевелящееся — белые личинки, которые тут же тают и обращаются в дым.{/n} "Я... это была не я! Клянусь всем, что свято! Не знаю, что это за вторая "дорога" и кто ее стережет, но молю, держитесь от нее подальше!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира резко втягивает воздух и закашливается. Из ее рта на пол летит что-то белесое и шевелящееся — белые личинки, которые тут же тают и обращаются в дым.{/n} "Я... это была не я! Клянусь всем, что свято! Не знаю, что это за вторая "дорога" и кто ее стережет, но молю, держитесь от нее подальше!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉深吸了一口气，咳嗽了一声。某种蠕动的白色东西从她的嘴里飞出来，落在地上。那些白色的蛆虫一落在地上就立刻融化，变成了烟。{/n}“那……那不是我说的！我以所有的神圣之名发誓！我不知道那第二条‘路’是什么东西，也不知道是谁在看守它，但我求你，离它远点！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"

languages.text: {n}Idira coge aire y tose. Algo pálido cae de su boca y se retuerce en el suelo: gusanos blancos que se derriten y se evaporan al instante.{/n} «Esa... ¡esa no era yo! ¡Lo juro por todo lo sagrado! No sé qué es ese segundo "camino" ni quién lo vigila, pero, se lo ruego, ¡aléjese de él!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"

Algo pálido cae de su boca y se retuerce en el suelo: gusanos blancos que se derriten y se evaporan al instante.{/n} «Esa... ¡esa no era yo! ¡Lo juro por todo lo sagrado! No sé qué es ese segundo "camino" ni quién lo vigila, pero, se lo ruego, ¡aléjese de él!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは息を吸い込んで咳き込む。青白く蠢く何かが口から飛び出し、床に叩きつけられた。白いウジは、すぐに溶けて煙に変わる。{/n}「あれは…あれはあたいじゃない！聖なるすべてに誓う！第二の『道』が何なのか、誰が見守っているのか知らないけれど、お願いだからあれには近づかないで！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは息を吸い込んで咳き込む。青白く蠢く何かが口から飛び出し、床に叩きつけられた。白いウジは、すぐに溶けて煙に変わる。{/n}「あれは…あれはあたいじゃない！聖なるすべてに誓う！第二の『道』が何なのか、誰が見守っているのか知らないけれど、お願いだからあれには近づかないで！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira atmet tief ein und hustet. Etwas Blasses, sich Windendes fliegt aus ihrem Mund und fällt zu Boden — weiße Maden, die augenblicklich schmelzen und sich in Rauch auflösen.{/n} "Ich ... das war ich nicht! Ich schwöre bei allem, was heilig ist! Ich weiß nicht, was die z weite 'Straße' ist oder wer sie bewacht, aber ich flehe Euch an, haltet Euch von ihr fern!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"

Etwas Blasses, sich Windendes fliegt aus ihrem Mund und fällt zu Boden — weiße Maden, die augenblicklich schmelzen und sich in Rauch auflösen.{/n} "Ich ... das war ich nicht! Ich schwöre bei allem, was heilig ist! Ich weiß nicht, was die z weite 'Straße' ist oder wer sie bewacht, aber ich flehe Euch an, haltet Euch von ihr fern!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira prend une grande inspiration et se met à tousser, expulsant de sa bouche d'étranges choses pâles et frétillantes : des vers blancs qui, dès qu'ils touchent le sol, s'évaporent en fumée.{/n} « Ce... Ce n'était pas moi ! Je le jure sur tout ce qui est sacré ! Je ne sais pas ce qu'est cette deuxième "route" ni qui la surveille, mais je vous en supplie, ne vous en approchez pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira prend une grande inspiration et se met à tousser, expulsant de sa bouche d'étranges choses pâles et frétillantes : des vers blancs qui, dès qu'ils touchent le sol, s'évaporent en fumée.{/n} « Ce... Ce n'était pas moi ! Je le jure sur tout ce qui est sacré ! Je ne sais pas ce qu'est cette deuxième "route" ni qui la surveille, mais je vous en supplie, ne vous en approchez pas ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, derin bir nefes alarak öksürüyor. Ağzından kıpır kıpır, solgun bir şeyler uçuyor ve anında eriyip dumana karışan beyaz kurtçuklar hâlinde yere düşüyor.{/n} "Ben... Konuşan ben değildim! Kutsal olan her şey adına yemin ederim! Bahsi geçen ikinci 'yolun' ne olduğunu da onu kimin izlediğini de bilmiyorum ama... Yalvarırım o yoldan uzak dur!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sucks in a breath and coughs. Something pale and wriggling flies out of her mouth and hits the floor — white maggots that immediately melt and turn to smoke.{/n} "I... that wasn't me! I swear on everything that's holy! I don't know what the second 'road' is or who watches over it, but, I beg you, stay away from it!"
